sentences.cn: 卡内基音乐厅的一场音乐会

sentences.en: A marble entrance hall leads to a sitting room.
sentences.cn: 大理石门厅通往起居室。

sentences.en: Each floor had ten rooms on both sides of the hall.
sentences.cn: 每一层在走廊的两边都各有十个房间。

sentences.en: Entries will be prominently displayed in the exhibition hall.
sentences.cn: 参赛作品将陈列在展厅显眼的地方。

sentences.en: His excellency the President will be waiting for you in the hall.
sentences.cn: 总统阁下会在大厅等你。

sentences.en: I broke away from him and rushed out into the hall.
sentences.cn: 我挣脱了他，冲进了大厅。

sentences.en: Nunsmere Hall can cater for receptions of up to 300 people.
sentences.cn: 纳恩斯米尔酒店最多可以同时接待300人。

sentences.en: She checked the hall, then gave the others a thumbs-up sign.
sentences.cn: 她查看了一下大厅，然后冲其他人竖了一下大拇指。

sentences.en: She has become a regular visitor to Houghton Hall.
sentences.cn: 她已经成了霍顿府的常客。

sentences.en: The car pulled in and double-parked in front of the town hall.
sentences.cn: 车在市政大厅前靠边并排停下了。

sentences.en: The crowd was too large to fit inside the hall.
sentences.cn: 人太多了，大厅里容不下。

sentences.en: The entrance hall is littered with toys and wellington boots.
sentences.cn: 门厅里到处乱扔着玩具和雨靴。

sentences.en: The exhibition hall reared above me behind a high fence.
sentences.cn: 高高的围墙后面，展览大厅耸立在我面前。

sentences.en: The hall is decorated in bright orangey-red with black and gold woodwork.
sentences.cn: 整个大厅用鲜艳的橘红色装饰，木建部分漆成黑色和金色。

sentences.en: Vivienne Westwood has scaled the heights of fashion's hall of fame.
sentences.cn: 薇薇恩·韦斯特伍德已成为时装界的翘楚。

sentences.en: We picked up our conference materials and filed into the lecture hall.
sentences.cn: 我们领了会议材料后鱼贯进入讲演厅。

sentences.en: Within minutes the hall was full of choking smoke.
sentences.cn: 几分钟不到，大厅里就弥漫着呛人的烟雾了。

phrases.tran_cn: 会议厅；会议室；会议场所
霍尔效应，内液增阻效应
讲堂，大讲堂；演讲厅；大教室，阶梯教室
市政厅；市政府；市民集会所

trans.tran_cn: 过道，走廊，大厅，前厅，娱乐中心，会所
trans.tran_en: the area just inside the door of a house or other building, that leads to other rooms
the area just inside the door of a house or other building, that leads to other rooms
